001package io.cyborgcode.roa.api.extensions;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.annotations.AuthenticateViaApi;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.authentication.BaseAuthenticationClient;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.authentication.Credentials;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.log.LogApi;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.fluent.RestServiceFluent;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.api.service.fluent.SuperRestServiceFluent;
009import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.CustomAllureListener;
010import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.decorators.DecoratorsFactory;
011import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
012import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage.StoreKeys;
013import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;
014import java.util.ArrayList;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.function.Consumer;
017import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeTestExecutionCallback;
018import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
019import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
020import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
021
022import static io.cyborgcode.roa.api.storage.StorageKeysApi.API;
023import static io.cyborgcode.roa.api.storage.StorageKeysApi.PASSWORD;
024import static io.cyborgcode.roa.api.storage.StorageKeysApi.USERNAME;
025import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.allure.StepType.PERFORMING_PRE_QUEST_AUTHENTICATION;
026
027/**
028 * Handles API authentication for test execution.
029 *
030 * <p>This JUnit 5 extension processes the {@link AuthenticateViaApi} annotation
031 * to authenticate users before API tests.
032 *
033 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
034 */
035public class ApiTestExtension implements BeforeTestExecutionCallback {
036
037   /**
038    * Executes authentication before test execution.
039    *
040    * @param context The test execution context.
041    * @throws Exception If authentication fails.
042    */
043   @Override
044   public void beforeTestExecution(final ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
045      context.getTestMethod()
046            .map(method -> method.getAnnotation(AuthenticateViaApi.class))
047            .ifPresent(annotation -> handleAuthentication(context, annotation));
048   }
049
050   private void handleAuthentication(final ExtensionContext context, final AuthenticateViaApi annotation) {
051      try {
052         Credentials credentials = annotation.credentials().getDeclaredConstructor().newInstance();
053         ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
054         DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory = appCtx.getBean(DecoratorsFactory.class);
055
056         Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer = createQuestConsumer(decoratorsFactory,
057               credentials.username(),
058               credentials.password(),
059               annotation.type(),
060               annotation.cacheCredentials()
061         );
062
063         addConsumerToStore(context, questConsumer);
064
065      } catch (InstantiationException | IllegalAccessException | InvocationTargetException
066               | NoSuchMethodException e) {
067         throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to instantiate credentials.", e);
068      }
069   }
070
071   private Consumer<SuperQuest> createQuestConsumer(DecoratorsFactory decoratorsFactory, final String username,
072                                                    final String password,
073                                                    final Class<? extends BaseAuthenticationClient> clientType,
074                                                    final boolean cacheCredentials) {
075      if (!CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(PERFORMING_PRE_QUEST_AUTHENTICATION.getDisplayName())) {
076         CustomAllureListener.startStep(PERFORMING_PRE_QUEST_AUTHENTICATION);
077      }
078      return (SuperQuest quest) -> {
079         quest.getStorage().sub(API).put(USERNAME, username);
080         quest.getStorage().sub(API).put(PASSWORD, password);
081
082         LogApi.extended("Updated quest storage with credentials for username: {}", username);
083         RestServiceFluent restServiceFluent = quest.use(RestServiceFluent.class);
084         SuperRestServiceFluent superRestServiceFluent =
085               decoratorsFactory.decorate(restServiceFluent, SuperRestServiceFluent.class);
086         superRestServiceFluent.getRestService().setCacheAuthentication(cacheCredentials);
087         restServiceFluent.authenticate(username, password, clientType);
088         if (CustomAllureListener.isStepActive(PERFORMING_PRE_QUEST_AUTHENTICATION.getDisplayName())) {
089            CustomAllureListener.stopStep();
090         }
091      };
092   }
093
094   private void addConsumerToStore(final ExtensionContext context, final Consumer<SuperQuest> questConsumer) {
095      @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
096      List<Consumer<SuperQuest>> consumers =
097            (List<Consumer<SuperQuest>>) context.getStore(ExtensionContext.Namespace.GLOBAL)
098                  .computeIfAbsent(StoreKeys.QUEST_CONSUMERS, key -> new ArrayList<Consumer<SuperQuest>>());
099
100      consumers.add(questConsumer);
101   }
102}
